DOC.brief_summary: Observational , cross-sectional , single-visit study 896 men woman Los Angeles , CA Baltimore , MD include computer-assisted interview focus behavioral repertoire surround RAI , symptom , health seek behavior multidimensional assessment behavior , anorectal examination , test sexually transmit infection ( STIs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Anorectal Microbicide Project ( AMP ) : Rectal Health , Behaviors Microbicide Acceptability
DOC.criteria: Men woman eligible meet follow criterion : 1 . At least 18 year age 2 . Willing tested STIs include HIV 3 . Willing undergo anal exam 4 . Mentally competent understand study procedure give inform consent . 5 . For NORAI group : No RAI past year nonRAI men woman 6 . For practice RAI group : Males : report RAI past 30 day Females : report RAI past 12 month 1 . Less 18 year age 2 . Unwilling test STIs ( HIV ) 3 . Unwilling undergo anal exam 4 . Unwilling complete study questionnaire 5 . Not mentally competent understand study procedure give inform consent .
